name: cs2300-project
description: Databases project for CS2300 at Missouri S&T

scripts.setup: npm install && cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install && cd ..
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd server && npm run start" "cd client && npm start"
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules && cd client && rm -rf node_modules && cd ../server && rm -rf node_modules && cd ..
